attributes.action: Reinstate Central Line service at Chigwell, Roding Valley & Grange Hill Stations
attributes.additional_details: TLF and Chris Taggart have decided to remove 4 trains from peak rush hour period despite  increased demand at Chigwell, Roding Valley and Grange Hill stations. Trains currently only run straight through to London every 20 minutes, this is not an acceptable train frequency for peak times. Customers are suffering and complaints about the diminished service are not being listened to.
attributes.background: Please sign the petition to get TLF to reinstate the trains or discount our fares as we are no longer receiving the service we are paying for.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. TfL is accountable to the London Assembly.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
